metadata.description: TiPAI-TSPO POC Dataset: 20 base prompts Ã— 4 variations (5+ objects, 3-4 changed per variation)

variation_types.v3_spatial: Wrong spatial relations or counts for 3-4 objects

metadata.design_note: Each prompt has 5+ distinct objects. Variations change 3-4 objects for clear segment identification.
